snippets: /* Scope all overrides to this page only */ body.prototype-home { --btn-bg: linear-gradient(180deg,#4EA1FF 0%,#1A73E8 100%); }

recommendation: Load css/overrides-prototype.css last with !important overrides to strip white backgrounds and force the ocean gradient.
Remove or neutralize inline background paints and box-shadows on .card/.tool-card elements so translucency shows the gradient.
Avoid background-attachment: fixed on mobile Safari; prefer scroll to keep gradient continuous without white seams.
Verify cache-busting query params on all CSS requests when redeploying so new overrides propagate.
Audit for pseudo-element overlays or service worker caches if white panels persist despite overrides.
